absolute; top: -10000px; height: 0px; width: 0px;\"><div><iframe name=\"fb_xdm_frame_https\" frameborder=\"0\" allowtransparency=\"true\" allowfullscreen=\"true\" scrolling=\"no\" id=\"fb_xdm_frame_https\" aria-hidden=\"true\" title=\"Facebook Cross Domain Communication Frame\" tabindex=\"-1\" src=\"https://staticxx.facebook.com/connect/xd_arbiter/r/96nq-xsaNcg.js?version=42#channel=f54c212a2dee&amp;origin=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.joyus.com\" style=\"border: none;\"></iframe></div></div><div style=\"position: absolute; top: -10000px; height: 0px; width: 0px;\"><div></div></div></div>\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n  window.fbAsyncInit = function() {\n    FB.init({\n      appId      : '131805500239539', // App ID\n      status     : true, // check login status\n      cookie     : true, // enable cookies to allow the server to access the session\n      xfbml      : true,  // parse XFBML\n      version    : 'v2.0'\n    });\n\n    // Additional initialization code here\n    FB.getLoginStatus(function(response) {\n        if (response.authResponse) {\n            loginFbUser(response.authResponse.accessToken, response.authResponse.userID);\n        }\n      });\n    FB.Event.subscribe('auth.authResponseChange', function(response) {\n        if (response.authResponse) {\n            loginFbUser(response.authResponse.accessToken, response.authResponse.userID);\n        } else {\n            logoutFbUser();\n        }\n    });\n\n    // if iframed on Facebook\n    if($(\"meta[name=fb]\").length && $(\"meta[name=fb]\").attr('content')==\"true\"){\n        FB.Canvas.setSize();\n    }\n\n  };\n\n  // Load the SDK Asynchronously\n  (function(d){\n     var js, id = 'facebook-jssdk'; if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}\n     js = d.createElement('script'); js.id = id; js.async = true;\n     js.src = \"//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js\";\n     d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(js);\n   }(document));\n\n  function FB_PostVideoVote(accessToken, movieUrl) {\n      FB.api(\n              '/me/hellojoyus:vote_for?movie='+movieUrl+'&access_token='+accessToken,\n              'post',\n              function(response) {\n                  if (!response || response.error) {\n                      //console.info('FB_PostVideoVote Error Occured');\n                  } else {\n                      //console.info('FB_PostVideoVote Success, Action ID: ' + response.id);\n                  }\n              }\n      );\n  }\n\n  function FB_PostVideoWatch(accessToken, movieUrl) {\n      FB.api(\n              '/me/video.watches?movie='+movieUrl+'&access_token='+accessToken,\n              'post',\n              function(response) {\n                  if (!response || response.error) {\n                      //console.info('FB_PostVideoWatch Error Occured');\n                  } else {\n                      //console.info('FB_PostVideoWatch Success, Action ID: ' + response.id);\n                  }\n              }\n      );\n  }\n\n    function FB_PostComment(accessToken, postId, message) {\n      FB.api(\n              '/'+postId+'/comments?message='+message+'&access_token='+accessToken,\n              'post',\n              function(response) {\n                  if (!response || response.error) {\n                      console.info('FB_PostComment Error Occurred ' + response.error);\n                  } else {\n                      console.info('FB_PostComment Success, Comment ID: ' + response.id);\n                      console.info(response);\n                  }\n              }\n      );\n  }\n\n</script>\n            <div id=\"reactHeader\"   wrap: 'circular',\n            scroll: 1,\n            start: 0,\n            setupCallback: function (carousel, state) {\n                carousel.get(1).addClass('current');\n                $(\".latest-updates-carousel\").css('visibility', 'visible');\n            },\n            itemFirstInCallback: function (carousel, state) {\n                // Only show overlay on center item\n            </script>\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n!function(e){function n(t){if(r[t])return r[t].exports;var a=r[t]={exports:{},id:t,loaded:!1};return
